title: QAQ论坛什么时候有广告了
author: Zed_Square
txt_content:
好久没上MCBBS，今天想来看看MCPE0.9.0的进度，谁知上来就给我一个广告...右上角的“关闭”小的要死，点一下没点中就跳到【聚购网】了...论坛开始赚钱了么[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]
[stone][diamond_ore][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]
[diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][stone][diamond_block][stone]
[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

replies.author: lisongnan7
replies.txt_content: 没广告哪有论坛的今天..OAO
